external_references.source_name: Socket BeaverTail XORIndex HexEval Contagious Interview July 2025
external_references.description: Kirill Boychenko. (2025, July 14). Contagious Interview Campaign Escalates With 67 Malicious npm Packages and New Malware Loader. Retrieved October 19, 2025.

objects.description: [XORIndex Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1248) has the ability to collect the hostname, OS Username, Geolocation, and OS version of an infected host.(Citation: Socket BeaverTail XORIndex HexEval Contagious Interview July 2025)
